game_description: Come and discover exclusively the artistic universe of the singer Hervé in the "Culturebox City", a virtual extension of the set of "Culturebox, the show". In this universe, you will have the privilege of living a variety of experiences: ** Take part in a unique and interactive performance by the artist ** Discover his intimate universe via archives in a playful exhibition room ** Access exclusive immersive behind-the-scenes videos of a recent Hervé performance Other surprises await you in this dreamlike world, so don't wait any longer to experience the full potential of this experience!
